{"id":909750782,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1678046533,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/909750782/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    char generateRandom(char a, char b){\n        char generated_char=(char)(rand()%25+97);\n        while(generated_char==a || generated_char==b)\n        generated_char=(char)(rand()%25+97);\n        return(generated_char);        \n    }\n    string modifyString(string s) {\n        if(s.length()==1){\n            if(s[0]=='?')\n            s[0]='a';\n            return(s);\n        }\n        int n=s.length();\n        if(s[0]=='?')\n        s[0]=generateRandom('z',s[1]);\n        if(s[n-1]=='?')\n        s[n-1]=generateRandom(s[n-2],'z');\n        for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++)\n        if(s[i]=='?')\n        s[i]=generateRandom(s[i-1],s[i+1]);\n        return(s);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
